xxl.connectivity.colt
Class ColtContinuousRandomWrapper

java.lang.Object
  xxl.connectivity.colt.ColtContinuousRandomWrapper
All Implemented Interfaces:
ContinuousRandomWrapper
public class ColtContinuousRandomWrapper
extends Object
implements ContinuousRandomWrapper

This class provides a wrapper for using any random element provided in the colt library with xxl. If no random engine is given, the Mersenne Twister PRNG will be used. Furthermore, this wrapper enables the user to assign a continuous distribution the generated random numbers should follow. As default instance, the uniform distribution over the interval [0.0, 1.0] is used.

Method Detail

nextDouble

public double nextDouble()
Computes the next element of the given distribution. If no explicit distribution is given, the uniform distribution over (0.0,1.0) is used.

Specified by:
nextDouble in interface ContinuousRandomWrapper
Returns:
next computed random number
